title: australia movie font?
content:
This will probably be easy for you guys - any idea what font this is? Is it custom?

[http://www.australiamovie.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100815043637/http:/www.australiamovie.com/ "http://www.australiamovie.com/")
author: macgee

comments.content:
I don't think ITC Juanita was used for the title 'Australia'.  
Certainly looks like it might have been used for the by lines though.

I'd be really interested to find out what font was used on the main title.
Main title was deemed custom, see [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20100815043637/http:/typophile.com/node/47620).
